lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women in the workplace...  We cannot survive without help and support from others, even if those people are across the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college for music performance, and I someday hope to teach at a college. I currently teach college-level music at the college which I attend, and I am also a church musician for a local church.

lenders.name: Adam R.
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently graduated from high school and will be attending a university in the fall. I wish to continue with Kiva because it gives me the chance to connect and help people in need from all over the world just from my computer at home.

lenders.name: Shannara
lenders.loan_because: ... the difference between charity and Kiva-ing is like giving a man a fish and giving him a fishing rod. I love to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't we?  The computers we use right now are individually worth at least  twice as much as most people earn in a year. (50 percent of the world's population earns less than 2 dollars a day)  Seems like a good enough reason to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a husband, father and journalist.  I tell stories.

lenders.name: Kelsey - Charleston, SC
lenders.loan_because: I have two great friends who gave me a gift certificate to Kiva as a graduation present and thought it was such a neat way to help others, and I hope that it will be a gift that keeps on giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in grad school for Speech Pathology

lenders.name: Kim & Brad
lenders.loan_because: because it is a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: we are studio potters & own a contemporary craft gallery which features primarily North American craft artists as well as work from select fair trade organizations. (our website is still in the early stages...please check back again!)

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: Each invester individually can make a difference.  I have been blessed!

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I like to see others succeed and improve the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Through my website Natural Living for Women I explore ways to live more naturally from our skin care  to our home.  I focus on knowing how to make safer more natural choices for ourselves and families but also caring about who and what is affected when our products are made.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: of the difference that a loan can make in someone's life. Because what seems like next to nothing can mean the world to someone else.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Miller Family
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to bypass bureaucracy and help in a direct way people around the world that have been affected by the lop-sided wealth distribution in our world.

lenders.name: Sugato
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Jody and Jenna
lenders.occupation: Jody is a journalist and Jenna is a student
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we see the direct results of our loans, and we like the idea of helping people who are working so hard to help themselves.

lenders.name: yvonne and luke
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to offer them  the opportunity to create a better life for themselves, their families and their society.
lenders.occupational_info: I love volunteering (especially with my dog, Luke).....I have traveled to many countries and love the cultural diversity.  We can accomplish so much working from the inside out, and allowing people to make their own decisions and create their own destiny. ..

lenders.name: courtney
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because:
Microfinance really works and because I want to make the most difference I can.  

Because being able to take out a loan, and especially being able to take out a loan without a really high interest rate, can make such a difference.  It can make it so much easier to invest in the future and to build stronger, healthier, more secure, more sustainable families, communities, and economies.

We have a lot of investing for the future to do.  Access to capital is an important piece of the puzzle.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from university.  I studied environmental studies.  I want to work with people finding community solutions to problems.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: It's too far to visit and I can't think of anything that makes a bigger difference in the world than helping its passengers.
lenders.occupational_info: I hope to use law to improve prople's lives, help families be together, protect the weak, and rein in the strong.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of microloans and web sites like Kiva.org that, used together, allow people living in more prosperous countries to connect with true small-business entrepreneurs we would otherwise not be able to help in such a direct manner.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a social worker studying to be a researcher and teacher so that I can become a better advocate for my fellow human beings.

lenders.name: Nackesha
lenders.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is required."

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to be a citizen of a prosperous and free country.  I am privileged to be able to share that prosperity with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychologist who works with people who have been abused to help them heal from their painful memories.

lenders.name: Barney
lenders.loan_because: I am able and others can benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: Serving in the way of Jesus.

lenders.name: Milene
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: VICKIE
lenders.loan_because: I raised 2 sons of whom I am very proud . The thought that I could reach out to help in some small way brings me happiness.With world food prices I also add extra items to my cart to take to local food banks.One person can make a diffrence.Help even a little bit helps

lenders.name: matthew
lenders.loan_because: just thought I might help out,
lenders.occupational_info: just working around the house, and trying to keep it up...

lenders.name: E&T
lenders.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: it's the very least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student pursuing a masters degree in library and information management with a strong interest in anti-poverty work, human rights and social justice.  Eventually I plan on attending law school and build a career doing anti-poverty legal work on both a local and transnational level.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I loan to give entrepreneur’s that need support a break.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help make the world markets more transparent and fair to investors.

lenders.name: Steve - Shellie
lenders.loan_because: We believe that everyone is connected and it is our responsibility to help those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is a Juvenile Court Judge. He hears cases regarding childrens & familiy issues.  Shellie is a Parent Mentor for a local school district. She works with families who have children with disabilities.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help other women who need money to achieve their dreams.
Quisiera ayudar a otras mujeres quien necesitan dinero a realizar sus sueños.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a writer, poet, and translator.  I work as a computer programmer and web developer, and sometimes as a teacher. 
Soy escritora, poeta, traductora. Estoy trabajando con computadores y a veces, soy profesora.
Buen suerte a Uds. y sus familias...

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: it's good for the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Screen printing

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it empowers people and allows them take control of their futures.  This leads to greater freedom, independence, and a higher quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Just a guy.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible.

lenders.name: Anudeva and Hanna
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Anudeva works with plants and animals and Hanna is a painter.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: Because my faith compels me to embody thankfulness  for the amazing resources in my care simply for being born in the US.  I do not take that responsibility lightly and loaning money  in this way one way to show that thanks.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I want my money to go directly to Women.
lenders.occupational_info: I run our house and raise our children, while my wife works for money.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: Hard working people can use an assist
lenders.occupational_info: I provide design services to individuals

lenders.name: Sstoz
lenders.loan_because: boo usury!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm paid to push wrong paper to wrong departments at wrong time using wrong forms.

lenders.name: Kushal
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer.

lenders.name: Noob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: As a ferret, I enjoy sleeping half my day away. I then eat and drink some water,  play for a few hours, then it is time for sleep again. My work is very easy as a ferret.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: I see that microfinance truly works and I want to love people through what I have and what I give.

lenders.name: Inze
lenders.loan_because: I like to travel around the world, and on my trips I encounter a lot of poverty. I like to try and help these people by enabeling them a small loan.

lenders.name: Espen
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the most effective way of helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a financial newspaper about business and economy in one of the richest countries in the world.

lenders.name: Will & Nick
lenders.loan_because: our Didi was a dentist.

lenders.name: Fred DeFalco
lenders.loan_because: The ability to be a resource to people around the world is very exciting. Kiva makes the Golden Rule easy to fulfill around the world.

lenders.name: jeff
lenders.loan_because: I believe it can make a difference to others.

lenders.name: Emmanuel
lenders.loan_because: I want to positively affect lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am into providing personal and corporate websites at a highly affordable rates.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: We are resposnisble for one another, regardless of international borders.
lenders.occupational_info: Make paper

lenders.name: shelagh
lenders.loan_because: Here in Canada we have so much, even when we think we don't. Every time you help someone else you help yourself. We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that our calling is to help others.  This opportunity allows me to help individuals and families around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are pastors of small churches (Lutheran and United Methodist, respectively).  Much of our time is spent helping people in need and caring for the hurting.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur all my life and want to support people around the world who are working to better their lives.  I've been fortunate to be able to live a secure and comfortable life in the US. I would wish that for all my fellow humans.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I'm retired from real estate sales and development; I still manage a small building.  In the past I've had retail stores, done importing, product design, real estate brokerage and development -mostly adaptive re-use of old buildings.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: I think entrepreneurs can change the world to a better world. And all payed back loans will be reinvested.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a coach exclusive for entrepreneurs of small and medium enterprises. I'm also author of books and founder of an education-portal for entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Damon
lenders.loan_because: everyone's dreams are realized when we invest in each other and not opaque institutions
lenders.occupational_info:
I decode DNA at my day job and do educaiton at high schools on biotech.
I take care of an apartment complex in Oakland California for my evening/community building job
I do freelance photography on the side

lenders.name: THESTUDENTSCHOOL
lenders.loan_because: Our committee fund raises at our high school and contributes to several progressive organizations, one being kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: high school students acting on injustice.  Microloans as an alternative to the mainstream development model.

lenders.name: Antoni & Mary
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Antoni develops web based software and Mary teaches music to children

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: We are trying to be a responsible business and feel that Kiva.org provides us with an excellent opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We build and sell modular homes throughout Vermont and Northern New England, providing affordable housing.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's the right thing to do.  It feels good to help someone directly.  Each loan is a reminder that in this small world one person can make a difference.  I like helping people with a work ethic similar to mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teachers help children become bilingual.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I dance, I garden, I learn.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: These loans are in memory of a friend who understood the need for compassionate strangers in the world. He was gifted, often conflicted, and he tried as hard as he could, which is as much as you can ask of any man. I know he would, without hesitation, help anyone else who was trying hard as well. Starting his own business was very precious to him, and he was proud to help others in this way.

lenders.name: Lester
lenders.loan_because: Trade is bigger than aid.

lenders.name: Karthik
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the opportunities I've been handed to those who have the will and determination to succeed with a break.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: It fits my view of how to best match fiscal responsibility and social justice.

lenders.name: Bennett
lenders.loan_because: Rising tides lift all boats.
lenders.occupational_info: By accident of birth I have had many opportunities in life.  I'm doing my part here to extend opportunity to others.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky in business and life and would like to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses manage their information.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who wants to better themselves, their family, or their community deserves the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that allows people anywhere in the world to trade directly with anyone else using the Internet.  I protect this virtual community founded on commerce

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky in my life, and want to give something back!  I enjoy contributing to a program that empowers individuals and also makes the world feel like a more intimate, optimistic place.  This is such a wonderful idea actualized!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for Leah's Pantry Inc., a non-profit organization that provides free nutrition workshops for people living in transitional, affordable and emergency housing shelters.     I help organize our workshops throughout California and facilitate workshops in San Francisco.

www.leahspantry.org

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It's the next best thing to being able to travel and help others around the world

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate to work for a large computer company, so I get the opportunity to work with a lot of modern technology.

lenders.name: La Luna Center
lenders.loan_because: I'm all for women owned small businesses!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping women overcome eating disorders.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I may not be able to have a big impact on the world, but I can have a big impact in the lives of the people I loan to.  Serving justice, serving others.

lenders.name: Elen
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Everyone should help out when they can.To be able to help someone help themselves is a great feeling
lenders.occupational_info: I develop new natural foods

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my small wall covering installation business, and want to help out someone else, especially in parts of the world were it's not so easy to get help. I'm very happy to be able to do something in this way!
lenders.occupational_info: I install (hang) wall coverings for clients in home, yachts and businesses

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and research mathematics at Michigan State University.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and so many are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor at a small college

lenders.name: Eugene
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people in poor countries to  make a better life for themselves, and in so doing  I hope to make personal contact  with them.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach physics (a basic science) and do research at the University of California in Berkeley, California, U.S.A.

lenders.name: Bryce
lenders.loan_because: my mommy says it is good to help others

-we can
-we love Jesus and to show appreciation for what God has given us
-we love it
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of young people who used to meet together, but are now spread out. Our money is still making a difference even though we're apart!

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the field of corporate operations for a really interesting biotech startup located near San Francisco, California.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I continue to find that each person here is more deserving of my money than I am

lenders.name: Abagail
lenders.loan_because: I loan because there is absolutely no reason not to.

lenders.name: Adrian Liston
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is an economic trap, lending instead of giving allows the same money to help over and over.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: it's only fair.

lenders.name: Kyung Hyun

lenders.name: Daniel

lenders.occupational_info: Fun and involved.

lenders.loan_because: I hope to see a real change for those who feel insignificant.

lenders.name: elliot

lenders.name: Lizzy

lenders.name: Patricia

There is a great quote from my favorite book, "Buddha Is As Buddha Does," by Lama Surya Das and it says, "May I perfect the sublime virtue of generosity, which liberates and releases craving, grasping, and attachment, and brings joyous contentment."
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a nurse. I hope to work as a nurse that travels on the flight-for-life helicopters in situations where patients are so seriously injured that they need to travel to the hospital by air transportation.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: The hardest step is the first one

I hope that my donations can help someone realize that he or she can be successful where ever he or she may reside. I believe all people can achieve their dreams with a little help from a friend.

lenders.name: Iqri Sulizar
lenders.loan_because: I need capital to buy new computer (Pentium 4 Centrino). This computer/notebook i can use to developt consultant webdesign and software database (my small business).
lenders.occupational_info: If someone or company want to create website. I can design interface, create code web and database. also i can help to create software database.

lenders.name: René
lenders.loan_because: I have had all the luck in the world living and growing up where I am. Through incentives like this, just maybe I can help people reach a similar level to the one that I enjoy as 'normal'.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people finding the information they need to do their work, and guiding them to knowledge they didn't have before.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: people helped me when I started from nothing.  I want to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make the most of who they are and live a great life.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.occupational_info: AmeriCorps VISTA

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Anytime my local community can add value to our global community it just seems like the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is what gives life meaning.
lenders.occupational_info: We make the machine that makes the world go around.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of entrepreneurship, and people helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: The concept of financial planning would seem ridiculous to poor people in the world.  How do you manage your extra money?

lenders.name: Dede
lenders.loan_because: I believe in reaching out to others to offer a hand up...

lenders.name: Julie & Dale
lenders.loan_because:
Because others have given so much to us... we believe by "paying it forward" we can show gratitude for our own blessings.

OK, so in lieu of more toys that our friends' children don't need, we loan money through Kiva in the child’s name.  Then, when the loan is repayed, they get the money.  A year later, they get to decide whether to take the repaid loan as cash, or recycle it by loaning it again to someone new.

I like this.
lenders.occupational_info: Wife does office work helping to enroll students in a private school outside Los Angeles, California; husband manages financial institutions (credit unions).

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired certified public accountant.

lenders.name: Len Estill
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly lucky to live in freedom and want to help those who haven't had the opportunities I've been given.  I also wish to assist someone who makes their living sewing, as I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work out of my home making items for sale at local shops.  My specialty is using vintage and antique goods (such as fabrics, laces, quilts and all kinds of supplies I find at thrift stores, garage sales and generous friends) to make items for resale.  I started my business when my son was small so I could be home with him.  He is now grown and I'm semi-retired.  Sewing has given me a creative outlet that has brought me peace and joy, and provided me a good living in the company of many wonderful people.

lenders.name: Scott, Shannon, Saffron
lenders.loan_because: Small businesses are the foundation of the economy, and no small business can flourish without access to capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business designing and manufacturing furniture.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: My money can make a difference for many people. Working for one's own happiness alone, makes no sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people here in the U.S. save money on their home mortgages by getting them fair interest rates.

lenders.name: muawia
lenders.loan_because: iwant povertiy pepole around the world feel more comfartable,in gaining  thier expenss of living.
lenders.occupational_info: acturlly ,igive acure medicine to illness pepole, wheneverand where ever need helps.in camps,hospitals,and in streets ...ext

lenders.name: celeste
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: Something that makes so little difference to me can make so much difference to these people and their families.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.occupation: Singer, Engineer, Soldier, and now Lender
lenders.loan_because:
'Do not store up for yourselves treasure on earth, where moth and rust destroy, and where thieves break in and steal.  But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven.."

Matthew 6:19-20

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: people need money and I have money.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to hear how God wants me to love people and help others do the same.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: ...it matters.

lenders.name: SHL
lenders.loan_because: I believe a little can go a long way.  And if a lot of people do a lot of "little" then it will become a lot of a lot!
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a regular guy.  I wake up, go to work, eat, sleep, and do it all over again the next day.  As a hobby, I am a soccer referee.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: All that I have is a blessing from, and belongs to, God.  I want share that blessing with others who deserve and need love from others.
lenders.occupational_info: Ground Control Electronics Tech

lenders.name: vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in life. As a single mother of three I want to share what I can, and I hope to instill in my children the desire to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: US Navy retired, and work for DOD now.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together, and I can do something to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college courses in English composition, literature, and adult education.

lenders.name: Loren
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to strive to better oneself.  If I can make a small contribution to someone's dream, then I am enriched!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a furniture store in my hometown.  Our large showroom displays living room,bedroom and dining room furnishings.  I assist our customers in choosing their new furniture.  I am paid by the hour and I receive a percentage of my sales as a commission.

lenders.name: Harry and Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: It helps people improve their situation.

lenders.name: Alissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself to have a chance at improving their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: A giant headache of paperwork and numbers.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: It makes a powerful impact!
lenders.occupational_info: Teach people how to become successful in their personal and professional lives

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to make an adequate living for them and their children, but need a helping hand to get started!

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because:
"I do not believe one can settle how much we ought to give.... I am afraid the only safe rule is to give more than we can spare. If our charities do not at all pinch or hamper us, I should say they are too small. There ought to be things we should like to do and cannot do because our charities expenditure excludes them."

-C.S. Lewis

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in business. Want to change the world? Educate a girl.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: People helping people is the way to Peace on Earth.

lenders.name: jim
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is direct and personal.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language.

lenders.name: Trevor

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant.

lenders.occupation: Serial Fashion Entrepreneur, CEO of aXXa
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be entrepreneur
lenders.occupational_info: Creating new fashion baseball caps for the youth.

lenders.name: Gibby
lenders.loan_because:
Please join Team AccuScore!  Kiva and other groups have and will continue to truly change the world by fostering independence and self reliance via microfinance.

Entrepreneurship is not defined by any economic means but by one’s spirit. There is no difference between Kiva entrepreneurs and venture-backed dot-coms. As fellow entrepreneurs, AccuScore supports the entrepreneurial spirit of any size, in any land.

PLEASE CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO JOIN TEAM ACCUSCORE!!

lenders.name: Lora
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and families that need this money more than I do.  ♥

lenders.name: John & Lois
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help people be able to help themself and their family .
lenders.occupational_info: We work several jobs in order to raise enough revenue to fund ministry in 3 small rural independent churches. We re-opened the churches that had been previously closed by large Christian denominations due to declining population. We have learned through the success of these small churches that all things are possible through God.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: By American standards, I am barely middle class. By world standards, I am really wealthy.  I want to share my good fortune with others to help make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to copy edit manuscripts for publication, including manuscripts for professional journals, dissertations, and textbooks. I am now retired and enjoy every minute of every day.

lenders.name: Shannon, Peter, Berkeley
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop curriculum for trade schools.  My husband makes people feel better by having them lift weights and exercise. Berkeley brings joy to our lives by just being a dog and doing what dogs do.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the world and small amounts of money can make a major difference in the developing world.  "We are All One" in humanity and this is a great expression of that Unity!
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Scientist

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me. Now it's my turn to help those less fortunate than I.

lenders.occupational_info: Now I am a volunteer in my community trying to payback for all the luck I have had

lenders.loan_because: If it feels good do it.

lenders.occupational_info: I create websites and help market people and companies. I am also creating a website to support artists as well.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach and study history so that I can better understand world affairs past and present. I hope to help the next generation to do the same. lenders.occupational_info: Jeff is an entertainer and filmmaker.

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a medical student i Denmark - in two years I will have finished my education and I will be a real doctor.

lenders.loan_because: I care about sustainability and small scale changes to create larger improvements.  A single small venture can by a catalyst for greater improvements in the local scene and have a disproportionally high impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I focus on sustainability and conservation of the environment, specifically in cooperation with human needs.

lenders.name: Deta Program
lenders.occupational_info: This is a group of high school students who work together to raise money for non-profit agencies.

lenders.name: Loren

lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization whose sole mission is preventing child abuse.  My job is to raise funds for our programming and managing projects and special events.

lenders.name: Oscar

lenders.name: Earth
lenders.loan_because: One earth, one dream.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself.

lenders.occupational_info: I retouch photos. That is, my studio makes photos look better for advertising agencies, publishers and photographers. This includes fixing damaged photos for individuals. We also teach it for those who  like to do it themselves.

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.occupational_info: Retired purchasing agent

lenders.name: Arin
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: James & Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I was initially impressed by Kiva's vision to promote sustainable development by loaning rather than donating, thus creating a culture of individual responsibility and accountability.  I have a been a member for a few years now, and all of my loans have been repaid in full - as a result we continue to increase our outstanding commitment with each repayment!

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in other countries develop businesses to benefit themselves and their families

lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe those that can help, should help.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it's the easy, right thing to do.

lenders.name: Allison

lenders.loan_because:
Leviticus 25:35-37
" 'If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, help him as you would an alien or a temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you.  Do not take interest of any kind from him, but fear your God, so that your countryman may continue to live among you. You must not lend him money at interest or sell him food at a profit.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a graduate student and an employee of a company that manages apartments.

lenders.name: MaryAnn
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur (www.BusinessPlanMaster.com and www.CaliforniaRendezvous.com ) and former Peace Corps volunteer, I appreciate the skills that entrepreneurs bring, from all over the world.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am a world traveller and have always felt strongly about giving back to the global community, especially in direct concrete ways. I am a huge advocate of thinking globally and acting locally and hope to do what little I can to contribute to a better world for us all.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a University. My classes are about food, development, and culture. I also work with farmers in Central America to help them gain secure rights to their land.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: Small loans are the best way to stimulate small businesses.

lenders.name: Mohamed
lenders.loan_because:
I want recover from my financial problem. However, My Parents got a loan from the landlord for high rate intrest for our house construction. 

As i am an elder son, its my responsibility to repay the loan. so that i came to Saudi Arabia to earn money to repay my loan as well as to fullfil my dreams as to run the Social work organization. 

Besides, I am gaining Rs.20000 per month and i have been paid Rs.5000/month. Since last two years i am paying intrest only and i could not save the money because i want to send money to my parents, my wife and for my personal expense.

I could not return to india since my financial barrier.
lenders.occupational_info:
If i got a loan from Kiva.org. i will be repay my loan and i can save Rs.5000/month which will be easy to repay my loan.

Eventhough, its out of kivo.org's scop i apply for my individual growth towards to uplift deprived people.

lenders.name: Benny, Gem, Edi & Diesel
lenders.loan_because: My father helped me become involved with Kiva, he has shared his passion of caring for others with me. I am so greatful to be able to help others in this way! Thanks Dad!
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for sick children in Hospital

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because:
I am taking a Microfinance class at Uni (Sweden) this summer. 
And I have a special interest in random topic, like Roma people (that's why picking my friend Nikola).
I want to give people an opportunity to create a better living. It could have been my family, if I was born elsewhere...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working with development & humanitarian aid, for a Swedish organization, based in Uppsala.The organization supports some microfinance projects, via the partner organizations in different countries around the world. Besides that it is also supporting development projects and humanitarian work.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because:
I have had lots of loans so I thought I should share with people who need credit more than I do. The best reason to borrow money is to invest it.
    To succeed in business, income must exceed expenses over time and some profit should be re-invested to develop the enterprise or start a new venture.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a little boy named John who is autistic. He is learning to play baseball and getting better after 5 years of therapy .. thank God

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like the example of Muhammad Yunas and the Grameen Bank.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage projects that organize and design manufacturing facilities and the work that occurs there.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: It's one small thing I can do.  I don't have any control over a lot of things that are going on in the world, but I can do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in public health, where we try to keep people healthy instead of making them well after they get sick.

lenders.loan_because: I do
lenders.occupational_info: I am a tea merchant so I understand retail commerce

lenders.occupational_info: i'm a reseller

lenders.loan_because:
He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD,

lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children to play the piano

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Better to give

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I just simply believe that micro-lending is an excellent way to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Former teacher and human resources professional

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe that you will get what you give. I think we all should give help to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses, businesses, land. I am a Real Estate Agent

lenders.name: Eden Central Schools
lenders.loan_because: We conducted a penny drive to raise money for Kiva.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility to share what I have with my community, and that community is the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students about educational administration.  For example, I teach many things that someone who wants to be a college or university administrator would want to know about that job.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Kiva helps people help themselves.   I loan because Kiva does not take any overhead & I know exactly where my money is going.  I loan because I'm helping small businesses grow in a time when big business is taking over everywhere and making it hard for small farmers or storeowners.  I loan because $25 is a negligible deduction from my life and a huge impact on others'.  I loan because as the loans are repaid I will be able to reuse that money to loan more and more each year.
lenders.occupational_info: I head the interior design team for a company that manufacturers luxury houseboats.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: To help make dreams come true for those who are less fortunate and need  financial assistance and encouragement  to better their lives.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: it is a chance for me to give back to those who need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a home business and do court transcripts from home as well.  No 9 to 5 for me!

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: If I am reincarnated, I want to increase my odds of living in a decent place, both with good karma and more decent places.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: mercy
lenders.loan_because: I am from Africa and I know first hand how microloans can impact peoples lives. I'm very excited to help people achieve their dreams of financial independence
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Reference librarian. Its an exciting job coz I love helping people. I assist people with research  projects and also help patrons find reading material.I also help with computer related issues
